title: Mirrors - Installation

body.body: If the mirror fixing is too loose, the mirror may blow back at speed. This will result in a loss of vision to the rear of the motorcycle. It is dangerous to ride a motorcycle without sufficient rearward vision.
Mirror Install DP DPA DP2 DC DC3 DP3
The external thread on the mirror boss is a right hand thread.
If removed, fit the mirror boss to the master cylinder housing and tighten to
The mirror arm and its lock nut has a left hand thread.
Fit the mirror arm to the mirror boss, tighten by hand until the lock nut makes contact with the mirror boss. Do not fully tighten at this stage.
Loosen the mirror arm by one complete turn.
Position the mirror arm to give rear visibility in the riding position.
Use an open ended spanner to counter-hold the mirror boss as the mirror lock nut is tightened. Failure to counter-hold the boss will cause damage to the thread and the mirror to become loose.
Counter-hold the mirror boss and tighten the lock nut to
Slide the rubber cover over the lock nut and mirror boss.
Repeat the procedure for the other mirror.
